panels.description: This is the total number of requests made in this period (top-right period selected)
panels.title: Requests (period)

panels.description: This is the total number of connections made in this period (top-right period selected)
panels.title: Connections (period)

panels.description:
This is the percentage of successful requests over the entire period in the top-right hand corner.

NOTE: Ignoring 404s in this metric, since a 404 is a normal response for errant/invalid request.
panels.title: % Success (period)

panels.description: This is the number of successful requests in the last five minutes.  Successful being 1xx or 2xx by the standard HTTP definition.
panels.title: HTTP 1/2xx (5m)

panels.description: This is the number of 5xx requests in the last five minutes.
panels.title: HTTP 5xx (5m)

panels.description: The number of HTTP requests made in the last five minute window
panels.title: Reqs (5m)

panels.description: This is the number of new connections made to the ingress in the last five minutes.
panels.title: Conns (5m)

panels.description:
This is the percentage of successful requests over the last five minutes.

NOTE: Ignoring 404s,  in this metric, since a  404 is a normal response for errant requests
panels.title: % Success (5m)

panels.description: This is the number of 3xx requests in the last five minutes.
panels.title: HTTP 3xx (5m)

panels.description: This is the number of 4xx requests in the last five minutes.
panels.title: HTTP 4xx (5m)

panels.description: The number of healthy replicas of the upstream service members
panels.title: Upstream members

panels.description: NOTE: Not including 404s in this metric, since a  404 is a normal response for errant requests
panels.title: Ingress Success Rate (non-4|5xx Responses)
